mapper.insert: insert into tb_class_attend (id,class_no, attend_date) select id, class_no, curdate() as attend_date from tb_class_member
mapper.select: SELECT DATE(tb1.attend_date) AS attend_date, ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_class_attend tb2 WHERE tb2.attend_date = tb1.attend_date AND tb2.g_no = '1001' and tb2.class_no=#{classNo} ) AS 'attend_on', ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_class_attend tb3 WHERE tb3.attend_date = tb1.attend_date AND tb3.g_no = '1002' and tb3.class_no=#{classNo} ) AS 'attend_late', ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_class_attend tb4 WHERE tb4.attend_date = tb1.attend_date AND tb4.g_no = '1003' and tb4.class_no=#{classNo} ) AS 'attend_early', ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_class_attend tb5 WHERE tb5.attend_date = tb1.attend_date AND tb5.g_no = '1004' and tb5.class_no=#{classNo} ) AS 'attend_off' FROM tb_class_attend tb1 WHERE 1=1 and tb1.class_no=#{classNo} GROUP BY tb1.attend_date
